name: 2022 7th International Conference on Multimedia Systems and Signal Processing
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be published into the ICMSSP 2022 Conference Proceedings (ISBNï¼š978-1-4503-9642-4), which will be published by ACM, and archived in the Online Digital Library. The proceedings will be submitted to be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
